oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andy Devine, movie actor, 1940 January
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Hollywood movie star Andrew Vabre “Andy” Devine (1905-1977), an American character actor and comic cowboy sidekick. Photo dated January, 1940. Unidentified man, pictured on the right. It was in April, 1940 when the Devine’s made a highly-publicized trip to the Maryland Farms in Brentwood, Tennessee, interested in high-quality horses. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Devine, Andy, 1905-1977
